sections.text: care facility; duties.A health care facility licensed under the Health Care Facility Licensure Act that receives reimbursement under the Nebraska Telehealth Act for telehealth consultations shall establish quality of care protocols and patient confidentiality guidelines to ensure that such consultations meet the requirements of the act and acceptable patient care standards.SourceLaws 1999, LB 559, ยง 7;Laws 2000, LB 819, ยง 147.Cross ReferencesHealth Care Facility Licensure Act, see section 71-401.

71-8507.Health care facility; duties.

A health care facility licensed under the Health Care Facility Licensure Act that receives reimbursement under the Nebraska Telehealth Act for telehealth consultations shall establish quality of care protocols and patient confidentiality guidelines to ensure that such consultations meet the requirements of the act and acceptable patient care standards.

SourceLaws 1999, LB 559, ยง 7;Laws 2000, LB 819, ยง 147.

Cross ReferencesHealth Care Facility Licensure Act, see section 71-401.
